item.title: SingPost honors Team Singapore's accomplishments in Rio
item.description: Source: SingPost. Singapore Post, or SingPost, is releasing two limited-edition stamp sheets on August 29, 2016, to honor Team Singapore’s performance at the 2016 Rio Olympics. This project is a collaboration with the Singapore National Olympic Council, and all profits, with a minimum of S$10,000, will be donated to the Singapore Olympic Foundation. This includes Singapore’s first-ever Olympic gold medal. One sheet, the limited edition “Team Singapore MyStamp” sheet, costs S$20, with a face value of S$6.

item.title: Commemorative stamp marks 34 years of diplomatic relations between the UAE and China
item.description: Source: Emirates Post Group. Commemorative stamps for 34 years of diplomatic relations between the UAE and China. In honor of Chinese President Xi Jinping’s visit to the UAE, Emirates Post Group (EPG), working with the UAE Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation, has introduced commemorative stamps. These stamps celebrate 34 years of diplomatic ties between the two nations. The stamps showcase three distinct designs: one featuring a portrait of UAE President HH Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan, another with a portrait of the Chinese President, and the third displaying both countries’ flags.
